desc: 世界を構成するエレメントの力をまったく秘めていない稀有な岩石

dictionary.lore: This peculiar rock originally lacked the necessary components which make a rock, a rock. As it doesn't contain any of the six elements, it's not mentioned much in synthesis manuals. It forms rarely in places near opposing light and dark elements, such as the sacred grounds and caves in St. Lamia.

name: 虚空岩
